author: naa_Amerley
text: Bro I like my tweets even before any other person does. That’s how much I like myself !

author: naa_Amerley
text: I may not be the most perfect/nicest person you’d ever meet, but when I say “I’m glad”, I mean I’m glad.😌

author: naa_Amerley
text: Not me hearing some random kids on the street saying “I’ll tell Aunty Tabitha”. Aren’t we supposed to be on vacation?!! Isn’t it too early?!! Not this morning,please Lord,not this morning 😖

author: naa_Amerley
text: Goodness!! I hope you had a perfect day🎉❤️ https://t.co/gbAofxP4Um

author: naa_Amerley
text: I’m sorry but Good Friday is not for those who want to mourn Jesus,it’s for those who want to celebrate Him for the sacrifice He made so many years ago. Celebrate Him,appreciate Him,because not only did Jesus die,He resurrected on the third day!! #Goodfriday

author: naa_Amerley
text:
“Aunty,somebody put the floor on my hand”
Me: Oh that somebody must be strong then
Pupil: “Yes,somebody is a girl”
Me:Okay,don’t mind her
Pupil: “No,is somebody”
Me:Okay,don’t mind somebody 
Pupil:Yes please 
I still wonder how I’ve put up with all this cos ei. Been quite a term!

author: naa_Amerley
text: So God ‘woke up’ and decided this is how the sun rises today ?!! Beautiful,beautiful, absolutely gorgeous!

author: naa_Amerley
text: And whenever you feel like that,it’s a great opportunity to fact-check.And by so doing,you’ll come to know that He’s got you whether you’re ‘deserving’ of it or not. That’s when how you feel begins to be in alignment with what He says-the facts.Hold on,and smile while you r at it

author: naa_Amerley
text: Don’t worry,Christianity isn’t as they paint https://t.co/gVn8cWdsB5 see, God is interested in every single detail of your life minus nothing- EVERYTHING. You’re allowed to ask why sometimes and ‘feel’ alone.Yes feel alone;because you’re actually not alone regardless how you feel

author: naa_Amerley
text: Just when I was about asking why it’s always Kunle,boom,a turn of events ! 😂😂😂 https://t.co/RZld0uVUru

author: naa_Amerley
text: While growing up,one time at church,the pastor was preaching about Tabitha’s death and how she was risen. He said, “so Tabitha died”, little me hearing my name went like, “I didn’t die oo,I’m here” 😂😂😂😭

author: naa_Amerley
text: The guy said “may3 s33 abaa” because I refused to buy his jeans 😂😂😭😭😭💔If you see my anywhere around town,just squeeze some money into my hands and ask me not to mind him,okay ?

author: naa_Amerley
text: Not me trying to clear my stress breakouts with something other than rest. Wow,Tabitha,wow !

author: naa_Amerley
text: He wants to give you everything you want and even more. Allow Him,you will not be disappointed!
